## PR Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines on pull requests](https://github.com/European-OpenSource/europeanopensource.eu/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-requests).
- [ ] I have read the [Code of conduct](https://github.com/European-OpenSource/europeanopensource.eu/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
- [ ] I have read the [CLA](https://github.com/European-OpenSource/europeanopensource.eu/blob/main/CLA.md) and accept the condition.

**If this is related to an issue/PR**:

- [ ] I documented and tested the code (issue #)
